updates.title: Extend post-game idle for recently active participants and add transient session expiry handling in e2e flows
updates.content:
Extend post-game idle for recently active participants and add transient session expiry handling in e2e flows

Commit: a4dc94f

- Implemented activity-based post-game idle extension for human participants to prevent premature session expiration.

updates.title: Ensure room code assignment for public overflow sessions
updates.content:
Ensure room code assignment for public overflow sessions

Commit: d0756e3

- Added `ensurePublicOverflowRoomCode` function to handle code normalization and reassignment for public overflow rooms.

updates.title: Refactor room joining logic and add retries for transient failures
updates.content:
Refactor room joining logic and add retries for transient failures

Commit: b24ff2e

- Introduced `joinRoomByCodeWithTransientRetry` to handle retries on transient room lookup failures.

updates.title: Refactor session and store persistence flow
updates.content:
Refactor session and store persistence flow

Commit: cc1ca11

- Updated `handleRefreshSessionAuth` to improve session and participant validation and retry expired sessions.

updates.title: Revamp private room create/join flow
updates.content:
Revamp private room create/join flow

Commit: 8367832

- Refactored private room functionality to split "Create Room" and "Join by Invite Code" into distinct workflows.

updates.content:

updates.content:
Document chat conduct service plan and implement moderation policy functionality

Commit: f881364

updates.content:
Add moderation actions and chat conduct policy enforcement

Commit: 510e9a6

- Introduced participant moderation functionality, including "kick" and "ban" actions, with authorization checks for owners and admins.

updates.content:

updates.content:

updates.content:

updates.content:

updates.content:
